welcome.title: Welcome to Meelio!
welcome.description: Let's take a quick tour of your productivity dock.

timer.title: Pomodoro Timer
timer.description: Stay focused with our Pomodoro timer. Break your work into focused sessions.

soundscapes.title: Soundscapes
soundscapes.description: Immerse yourself in calming ambient sounds to boost your productivity.

breathing.title: Breathing Exercises
breathing.description: Take mindful breaks with guided breathing exercises.

todos.title: Todo List
todos.description: Keep track of your tasks and stay organized.

site-blocker.title: Site Blocker
site-blocker.description: Block distracting websites during your focus sessions.

tab-stash.title: Tab Stash
tab-stash.description: Declutter your browser by stashing away tabs for later.

background.title: Backgrounds
background.description: Personalize your workspace with beautiful backgrounds.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Customize Meelio to match your preferences and workflow.

dialog.title: Soundscapes
dialog.description: Soundscapes are a collection of ambient sounds that can help you relax, focus, or sleep.

quote.text: Your life is designed to get the results you are getting right now. Whether you realize it or not, you are the architect
quote.author: Jim Rohn

sheet.title: Todo List
sheet.description: A list of tasks to help you stay organized and on top of your work, projects, and goals.

create.title: Create New List
create.description: Create a new list to organize your tasks. Choose an emoji and give it a name.

method.title: Breathing Method
method.description: Select a breathing method to help you relax and focus

calmDown.name: Calm Down
calmDown.details: Inhale for 4 seconds, exhale for 6 seconds

clearMind.name: Clear the Mind
clearMind.details: Inhale for 4 seconds, exhale for 4 seconds

relaxDeeply.name: Relax Deeply
relaxDeeply.details: Inhale for 4 seconds, hold for 7 seconds, exhale for 8 seconds

relieveStress.name: Relieve Stress
relieveStress.details: Inhale for 4 seconds, hold for 4 seconds, exhale for 4 seconds, hold for 4 seconds

stats.title: Stats
stats.description: Focus and break time for the week

timer.title: Timer
timer.description: Configure the timer settings in minutes, recommended values are between 1 and 60 minutes.

autoStart.label: Auto Start Breaks
autoStart.description: Start breaks after work sessions, i.e. after 25 minutes of work time automatically start a 5 minute break.

sound.label: Enable Sounds
sound.description: Play sounds when the timer ends, and when breaks start.

reset.label: Reset Pomodoro Timer
reset.description: Are you sure you want to reset the timer? This will reset the timer to the default settings.

reset.title: Reset Timer
reset.description: Are you sure you want to reset the timer? All progress will be lost.

tabs.comingSoon: This tab is not available yet

theme.label: Theme
theme.description: Select the theme for the application

dock.title: Dock Settings
dock.description: Customize which items appear in your dock

visibility.title: Dock Items Visibility
visibility.description: Control which items are visible in the dock

soundscapes.description: Ambient sounds to help you focus

backgrounds.title: Change Background
backgrounds.description: Select a background to change the wallpaper
backgrounds.author: Author

site-blocker.title: Site Blocker
site-blocker.description: Block websites to help you stay focused
site-blocker.extension-only: Site blocking functionality is only available in the browser extension.
site-blocker.premium-feature: Upgrade to Pro to block unlimited distracting websites and stay focused.

tab-stash.title: Tab Stash
tab-stash.extension-only: Tab stash functionality is only available in the browser extension.
